name: Line up (Aristi, konsnos)
description:
"Line up" is a puzzle game created during Panda-mic Game Jam. You work at the local supermarket, deciding who is going in and who is not. Every day the instructions may differ. One day mask and gloves is enough, the other you have to show a valid ID and transport papers. Be careful, keep track of the number of clients currently inside and follow the instructions closely.

What? What about pandas?

PLAY NOW in browser!

How to play
